SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.animation

Class AnimationRegion

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.animation.AnimationRegion
public final class AnimationRegion extends Object
Represents a region of animated blocks.

The region is created by creating a cuboid around the animated blocks, and then creating a marker block for each animated block. The marker blocks do not exist in the world and are only used to update the region during the animation.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimationRegion

      public AnimationRegion(List<IAnimatedBlock> blocks, TriFunction<Integer,Integer,Integer,Float> radiusSupplier, TriFunction<Integer,Integer,Integer,RotatedPosition> finalPositionSupplier)
      Creates a new animation region.
      Parameters:
      blocks - The animated blocks that are part of the region. The marker blocks will be created by creating a cuboid around these blocks.
      radiusSupplier - The radius supplier. This is used to determine the radius of the marker blocks.
      finalPositionSupplier - The final position supplier. This is used to determine the final position of the marker blocks.

  • Method Details

    • getRegion

      public Cuboid getRegion()
      Calculates the current region of the animation.
      Returns:
      The cuboid that represents the current region of the animation.

    • getMarkerBlocks

      public List<IAnimatedBlock> getMarkerBlocks()
      The 8 marker blocks that represent the region of animated blocks as an unmodifiable list.

      These blocks are simplified versions of the animated blocks, and are used to update the region during the animation. They have limited functionality.

    • getStartCuboid

      public Cuboid getStartCuboid()
      The cuboid that represents the region of animated blocks at the start of the animation.
